name: generate_venn_chart
description: Generate a Venn diagram to visualize the relationships between different sets, showing how they intersect and overlap, such as the commonalities and differences between various groups.

label.description: Label for the venn chart segment, such as 'A', 'B', or 'C'.

value.description: Value for the venn chart segment, such as 10, 20, or 30.

sets.description: Array of set names that this segment belongs to, such as ['A', 'B'] for an intersection between sets A and B.

data.description: Data for venn chart, such as, [{ label: 'A', value: 10, sets: ['A'] }, { label: 'B', value: 20, sets: ['B'] }, { label: 'C', value: 30, sets: ['C'] }, { label: 'AB', value: 5, sets: ['A', 'B'] }].

theme.description: Set the theme for the chart, optional, default is 'default'.

width.description: Set the width of chart, default is 600.

height.description: Set the height of chart, default is 400.
